data.name: Cyphers Game VR
data.detailed_description:
Take on the role of authentic soldiers of the 1920 Polish-Bolshevik War.
Activate communication devices from 100 years ago.
See what Bolshevik armored trains looked like up close.

"Cyphers Game" is a cross-platform educational project prepared as a short point and click game consisting of four missions.
It describes the course of the Polish-Bolshevik war and the influence of Polish cryptology on its victorious finale.

VR version of the recently published game "Cyphers Game".
data.about_the_game:
Take on the role of authentic soldiers of the 1920 Polish-Bolshevik War.
Activate communication devices from 100 years ago.
See what Bolshevik armored trains looked like up close.

"Cyphers Game" is a cross-platform educational project prepared as a short point and click game consisting of four missions.
It describes the course of the Polish-Bolshevik war and the influence of Polish cryptology on its victorious finale.

VR version of the recently published game "Cyphers Game".
data.short_description: Break Bolshevik ciphers and destroy a Soviet armored train - take part in a great history. VR version of crossplatform educational project prepared as a short point and click game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600, Core i5 6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7-11700K, AMD Ryzen 7 5700G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060, AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
